body_html: Upgrading to PyTorch for CUDA 9.1 appears to solve things. Although I also noticed a problem in my code when initializing some of the GPU tensors that may have contributed to the slowdown either all or in part, so I'm really sorry if that was actually the main issue. Thanks for the excellent support!

body: Upgrading to PyTorch for CUDA 9.1 appears to solve things. Although I also noticed a problem in my code when initializing some of the GPU tensors that may have contributed to the slowdown either all or in part, so I'm really sorry if that was actually the main issue. Thanks for the excellent support!
